findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: Owner can mint new tokens and sell.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The contract owner may contain the authority to modify the transaction tax or maximum trading amount, which can cause honeypot risks.

findings.title: Transaction tax increased to more than 49% may prevent token trading
findings.description: If the transaction tax is increased to more than 49%, the tokens may not be able to be traded (honeypot risk).

findings.title: Whitelist Function Risk
findings.description: Whitelisting function found, but contract ownership is renounced, this function can not be triggered by deployer. If there is a function for this Developer can set zero fee or no max wallet size for adresses (for example team wallets can trade without fee. Can cause farming)

findings.title: Zero fee or no max wallet size for addresses can cause farming
findings.description: If there is a function to set zero fee or no max wallet size for addresses, it can cause farming. For example, team wallets can trade without fees.
